recommendations: October 8, 2016, Biren reported directly to Pranav

I reported to Pranav for 18 months at PG&E. It is a pleasure to have a manager who has excellent technical breadth and depth and the one who understands the issues, challenge, escalations and opportunities to fix them very well. I was very inspired by his calm management style where I have never seen him agitated on any occasion.He allowed the right amount of space to his team and backed on issues that needs special attention. He has awesome relationship with business customers and BT Leads.During the various course of interactions, I have learned a lot from Pranav. I would any day grab the opportunity to work with Pranav again.

December 26, 2016, Pranav worked with Gopi in different groups

I had the opportunity to work with Gopi on multiple projects at PG&E. Gopi demonstrated strong leadership skills to drive the projects/programs for which he was responsible, to a successful completion. He also demonstrated the ability to adapt his program management skills to new technologies and methodologies. This was the key in order to be successful in the ever-changing landscape at PG&E.

In my experience Biren is an outstanding technologist with a keen desire and motivation to strive for the best possible outcome in any deliverable for which he is responsible. During his tenure in the Solution Architecture team at PG&E, he demonstrated ability to grasp quickly new technologies, willingness to put in all necessary effort and building strong relationships with the client as well as the architecture team. He was consistently focused on client success and maintaining high quality standards for all his deliverables. He was willing to take a firm, well-informed position on technical architecture considerations when required which I thought was a great quality to have in a solution architect.

summary: Experienced IT Leader, Enterprise Architect and Consultant with over 24 years of experience in the area of application architecture and solution delivery, with emphasis on multi-tier architectures, application security, Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) and API management, system integrations, and software lifecycle management. Portfolio of achievements includes designing, developing, and implementing application, security and infrastructure architecture, while remaining focused on customer-centric solutions, delivery and excellence.
name: Pranav Jhumkhawala
title: Technology Leadership and Delivery
